text: Sahamalaza National Park is in the northwestern part of Madagascar in Sofia region, with 26035 hectares. ==Geography== It is situated near Ambanja in the Ambanja District (Diana Region) and Analalava (Sofia region). ==See also== * List of national parks of Madagascar * Fauna of Madagascar ==external Links== * www.ecologie.gov.mg ==References== Category:Protected areas established in 2007 Category:National parks of Madagascar Category:Diana Region Category:Sofia Region Category:2007 establishments in Madagascar Category:Ramsar sites in Madagascar
title: Sahamalaza National Park
